channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Biden considering preemptive pardons for perceived enemies of Trump
item.description: President Biden is weighing giving preemptive pardons to perceived enemies of President-elect Donald Trump to shield them from possible "retribution."

item.title: Slaying of UnitedHealthcare CEO spotlights complex challenge companies face in protecting top brass
France's toppled government adds to the European Union's bigger political problems

item.title: Biden considering pre-emptive pardons for Trump critics - sources
item.description: The outgoing president is reported to be weighing up ways to protect those the new administration may go after.

item.title: 3 climbers from U.S., Canada believed dead in fall from New Zealand's highest peak

item.title: New photos released as NYPD hunt insurance boss killer
item.description: Police are still working to determine a motive in the slaying of insurance executive Brian Thompson.

item.title: Protecting Unique Wilderness at the Bottom of the World
item.description: Chile is poised to create it's 47th national part in the coming year, protecting wilderness at the southern tip of South America. That's thanks in lar...

item.title: Three climbers feared dead on New Zealand's tallest mountain
item.description: Police believe the two Americans and one Canadian fall while crossing a ridge on Aoraki Mt Cook.

item.title: Trump taps former Sen. David Perdue as next ambassador to China
item.description: Former Sen. David Perdue pushed President-elect Donald Trump's debunked lies about electoral fraud during his failed bid for Georgia governor in 2022.

item.title: California shooting suspect used fake story to gain access to school
item.description: Two Kindergarten-aged children wounded in the shooting are in critical but stable condition, police say.

item.title: Worshippers flee arson attack at Melbourne synagogue
item.description: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has called the fire an antisemitic "act of hate".

item.title: Some rural Nevadans want Trump to stop the state's solar energy boom
item.description: Backlash against massive solar energy farms drove strong rural turnout in Nevada may have helped flip the presidential vote there to Republican for th...

item.title: Words on ammo in CEO shooting echo common phrase on insurer tactics: Delay, deny, defend

item.title: Here's what to know about Trump's pick to lead the IRS, Billy Long
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump wants former lawmaker and auctioneer Billy Long to replace IRS Commissioner Danny Werfel.

item.title: NASA delays Artemis II human moon mission once again as it wraps up heat shield investigation
